code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const[isScrolled,setIsScrolled]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{const handleScroll=()=>{setIsScrolled(window.scrollY>50);};window.addEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);return()=>window.removeEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);},[]);const scrollToSection=sectionId=>{const element=document.getElementById(sectionId);if(element){element.scrollIntoView({behavior:'smooth'});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"header ".concat(isScrolled?'scrolled':''),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"nav",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo",children:"Sumit Patait Portfolio"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"nav-links",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#home",onClick:()=>scrollToSection('home'),children:"Home"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#about",onClick:()=>scrollToSection('about'),children:"About"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#skills",onClick:()=>scrollToSection('skills'),children:"Skills"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#projects",onClick:()=>scrollToSection('projects'),children:"Projects"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#experience",onClick:()=>scrollToSection('experience'),children:"Experience"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#contact",onClick:()=>scrollToSection('contact'),children:"Contact"})})]})]})});};export default Header;
